alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:09PM MST until December 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 1-3 inches. * WHERE...Lower elevations of the Gila Region and New Mexican Bootheel. Lower elevations west of the Continental Divide. * WHEN...Monday afternoon through early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Roads may become slick, snow packed, and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall during the evening and overnight hours before tapering by Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Upper Gila River Valley
